content:
Anchored in the heart of Ocean Drive on 6th, with warm sandy beaches, eclectic restaurants for alfresco dining, nightlife, boutique art galleries, fashionable shopping, indie retail and of course the boardwalk.

With direct access to downtown Miami and the Port of Miami via MacArthur Causeway. The Celino is less than seven miles from Miami’s top urban destinations including Wynwood, Brickell, Midtown and just blocks from South Pointe Park, Lincoln Road and Española Way.
